name: The Drunk Time Traveler's Fiancée
description:
Side scrolling parody NES Game for the ByteOff! 2020 Game Jam.  This game may someday become a full game but is currently a concept game. NOTE, Press up to interact with NPCs and continue dialogue. It is not Rude to jump over NPCs after speaking.

Mikey McMike woke up with a hang over. He realizes it's his wedding night, and he has to rush to his bride. As he approaches his love, he is sucked through time. What adventures await our drunken groom?
